meanings.definition: A person who creates something jointly with another.
meanings.sent1: The two friends were cocreators of a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The cocreators worked together to design a new app.
meanings.sent3: The cocreators joked that they were like peanut butter and jelly, always better together.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership as cocreators was a match made in heaven.
meanings.sent5: The cocreators' collaboration resulted in a masterpiece that amazed everyone.

meanings.definition: Those who collaborate in the act of creation.
meanings.sent1: The team of cocreators brainstormed ideas for the project.
meanings.sent2: Cocreators in the film industry often work closely with directors.
meanings.sent3: The cocreators laughed as they realized they both had the same idea at the same time.
meanings.sent4: Their synergy as cocreators brought magic to their work.
meanings.sent5: The cocreators' shared vision led to a groundbreaking invention.
